channel.title: Website Shell
channel.description: Ruby is a fag, Mod remove this please

item.title: Website Shell
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“RUNE-PK, post:14, topic:550254”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=669165.msg4474710#msg4474710 date=1425054416]

lol how bad was the deface? or what all did he do?

Not sure what sites he actually done but judging by his code and general common sense he’s gonna be one of those kids that finds a list of dorks on hf and goes down it until he finds one that hasn’t been done. It’s usually small businesses like furniture shops and clothing shops etc who made their site themselves due to lack of funds and then they don’t know how to rectify some 11 year old kids work and are back to square one.

Posting that here encourages all the other pre pubescent teens to use the same bad practice in code and bad reasoning for attacking harmless websites. Waste of time and space.
[/quote]

Lmao, you don’t know what i do so stfu, Oh btw We only attack websites that aren’t being used anymore dumbass[/quote]
You’re fucking clueless. Be quiet and come back when you’ve learned something that requires an IQ above 15.

Read full topic

item.title: Website Shell
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:10, topic:550254”]really upset i didn’t see op

someone please fill me in[/quote]

OP posted a deface page that looked like it had been written in 1998 and had the code practice to go with it. Obviously showing he had no knowledge of website development or anything of the like so I called him out for not understanding the same system he’s trying to exploit and ultimately wasting others time and he removed it because he realised that he was in the wrong the whole time.

Why do ruby seem to be the dick of this site… I have seen 50 complaints about him lol I mean don’t everyone start somewhere …

item.title: Website Shell
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“RUNE-PK, post:6, topic:550254”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=669165.msg4474648#msg4474648 date=1425006944]
Why bother, it’s clear from this you have no knowledge of anything website related. You have no web design sense, no sense of any kind of scripting. You’re coming off as one of those kids who go through a list of dorks and exploit some pakistani clothing store. It’s kinda embarrassing, to be honest.

Like there is legit no point in anyone who knows anything about website development and design helping you pick out the flaws in this because it’s not like it’s going to be used for anything good. There’s no point in releasing it because it’s a pile of silab.
[/quote]

Ruby, why don’t you shut your fudgeing mouth? I don’t do web design. So please keep your god damn mouth shut. Obviously I never post in web design because i don’t know it. Thank you for pointing out the obvious. fudge yourself, Im still learning bitch[/quote]

You’re learning by exploiting some little egyptian hair salons databases?

What gives you the right to exploit a database when it’s fucking guaranteed you’d make the same mistakes that their developer made because you’re just as fucking clueless. No I won’t shut my mouth. Do something productive rather than ruining others work and more than likely wasting a small businesses time.

Read full topic
